text.0: may benediction of the gods approach us holy to aid us with all rapid succours.
text.1: therewith may we be happily befriended and pass triumphant over all our troubles.
text.2: a man should think on wealth and strive to win it by adoration on the path of order.
text.3: counsel himself with his own mental insight and grasp still nobler vigour with his spirit.
text.4: the hymn is formed poured are the allotted portions as to a ford friends come unto the wondrous.
text.5: we have obtained the power of case and comfort we have become acquainted with immortals.
text.6: pleased be the eternal lord who loves the household with this man whom god savitar created.
text.7: may bhaga aryaman grace him with cattle may he appear to him and be delightful.
text.8: like the dawns dwellingplace be this assembly where in their might men rich in food have gathered.
text.9: striving to share the praises of this singer to us come strengthening and effectual riches.
text.10: this bulls most gracious farextended favour existed first of all in full abundance.
text.11: by his support they are maintained in common who in the asuras mansion dwell together.
text.12: what was the tree what wood in sooth produced it from which they fashioned forth the earth and heaven.
text.13: these twain stand fast and wax not old for ever these have sung praise to many a day and morning.
text.14: not only here is this more is beyond us he is the bull the heavens and earths supporter.
text.15: with power divine he makes his skin a filter when the bay coursers bear him on as sūrya.
text.16: he passes oer the broad earth like a stega he penetrates the world as wind the mistcloud.
text.17: he balmed with oil near varuṇa and mitra like agni in the wood hath shot forth splendour.
text.18: when suddenly called the cow that erst was barren she selfprotected ended all her troubles.
text.19: earth when the first son sprang from sire and mother cast up the gami that which men were seeking.
text.20: to nṛṣads son they gave the name of kainva and he the brownhued courser won the treasure.
text.21: for him darkcoloured streamed the shining udder none made it swell for him thus order willed it.
